is a  glacier and a skiing resort in the west

Kaunertal is open all year. You can find here well-kept cross-country tracks, a slalom downhill course and a fun-park.
If you don't want to ski, there is a golf course, an indoor swimming-pool, a four-cross track or night actions and many more. It is the smallest glacier in Austria and one of the cheapest. There are good downhills, many possibilities of entertainment and few people. It is the home resort of snowboarder Chris Kr√∂ll or skier Stephan Eberharter. , is 3,160 meters above sea level. There are fascinating views from this mountain. You can also see
. There live many animals, for example chamoix.
You can stay in hotels, hostels or private houses under the glacier.
In the summer you can sleep in a car on a parking place or in a tent nearby.
